overview: Aubrey Addams & Austin Taylor: The L Factor is at sea! Aubrey and Austin are laying out on the deck... Ryzell & Eu'Nique Styles: Down below in the galley, Eu'Nique and Ryzell enjoy each other's cookies... Laurie Vargas & Jazmine Star tuck themselves away in a nook of the yacht... And up on the bow, Dia Zerva and Hayden Night make waves of their own!
tagline: When you need sex, it doesn't matter where you are!
title: Lesbian Sex in Unusual Places
